entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
